thread.title: Attorney General Opens Probe into Fatal Shooting by Police in Crown Heights

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Attorney General Opens Probe into Fatal Shooting by Police in Crown Heights
text:
New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman opened an investigation Thursday into the New York Police Departmentâ€™s fatal shooting of a Brooklyn man who allegedly pointed a metal pipe at officers.
Police on Wednesday afternoon shot and killed Saheed Vassell, a 34-year-old resident of Crown Heights whose father said he suffered from bipolar disorder and who law-enforcement officials said had previous encounters with the NYPD.
Officers...
